/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the red and white buildings that line the street. These buildings, with their traditional Chinese architecture, are adorned with various signs and advertisements, adding to the vibrant atmosphere of the scene. The street itself is teeming with people and cars, indicating a busy time of day. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
